description: This is a breezy, well-lit full size one bedroom apt in Prospect Lefferts Gardens. Great train access to Manhattan with Brooklyn quiet, right next to the park and a short trip to the beach.
name: Spacious 1 bedroom off Prospect Pk
review: Paul was a fantastic host. Check in and check out were easy. He had great suggestions of places to visit in the neighborhood. His place was great and we would love to stay there again the next time we visit New York. Thanks so much Paul!
